remarks: An Axiom of Choice equivalent: there exists a function ` f ` (called a choice function) with domain ` A ` that maps each nonempty member of the domain to an element of that member.  Axiom AC of [BellMachover] p. 488.  Note that the assertion that ` f ` be a function is not necessary; see ~ ac4 .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-1999.)
statement:
ac5.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
ac5 $p |- E. f ( f Fn A /\ A. x e. A ( x =/= (/) -> ( f ` x ) e. x ) ) $.
$d A f x $.
